PASSWORD_IS_SHORT: Password should be longer than 8 symbols
COMPANY_NAME_TOO_SHORT: Company name must be at least 2 characters
COMPANY_ID_MUST_BE_INT: Company ID must be an integer
COMPANY_ID_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: Company ID must be a positive number
TEST_PROPERTY_TYPE_REQUIRED: Type of test property is required
TEST_PROPERTY_TYPE_INVALID: Test property type must be one of the defined enum values
COMMENT_TOO_SHORT: Comment must be at least 1 character
CUPPING_ID_MUST_BE_INT: Cupping ID must be an integer
CUPPING_ID_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: Cupping ID must be a positive number
COFFEE_PACK_ID_MUST_BE_INT: Coffee pack ID must be an integer
COFFEE_PACK_ID_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: Coffee pack ID must be a positive number
PROPERTIES_ARRAY_REQUIRED: At least one property must be provided
TESTS_ARRAY_REQUIRED: At least one test must be provided
USER_ID_MUST_BE_INT: User ID must be an integer
USER_ID_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: User ID must be a positive number
CUPPING_NAME_TOO_SHORT: Cupping name must be at least 3 characters
SAMPLE_ID_MUST_BE_INT: Sample ID must be an integer
SAMPLE_ID_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: Sample ID must be a positive number
PACK_ID_MUST_BE_INT: Pack ID must be an integer
PACK_ID_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: Pack ID must be a positive number
HIDDEN_NAME_INVALID_CHARS: Hidden sample name contains invalid characters
CUPPING_STATUS_INVALID: Cupping status must be one of: planned, inProgress, doneByCurrentUser, ended
SAMPLE_NAME_TOO_SHORT: Sample name must be at least 2 characters
BEAN_ORIGIN_CODE_INVALID: Bean origin code must be number
BEAN_ORIGIN_CODE_OUT_OF_RANGE: Bean origin code must be between 1 and 2
PROCESSING_METHOD_CODE_INVALID: Processing method code must be number
PROCESSING_METHO_CODE_OUT_OF_RANGE: Bean origin code must be between 1 and 4
COFFEE_PACKS_ARRAY_INVALID: Coffee packs info must be an array
ROAST_DATE_INVALID: Roast date must be a valid ISO 8601 date
OPEN_DATE_INVALID: Open date must be a valid ISO 8601 date
ROAST_TYPE_REQUIRED: Roast type must be provided for the sample
ROAST_TYPE_OUT_OF_RANGE: Roast type must be between 0 and 5
GRIND_TYPE_REQUIRED: Grind type must be provided for the sample
GRIND_TYPE_OUT_OF_RANGE: Grind type must be between 0 and 10
DATE_INVALID: That date must be in ISO format
NUMBER_INVALID: That number must be an number
NUMBER_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: That number must be greater then 0
ARRAY_REQUIRED: That value must be an array
ARRAY_MUST_BE_NOT_EMPTY: Array must include at least one value
VALUE_REQUIRED: That value must be provided for success request
USERNAME_TOO_SHORT: Username should be longer than 2 symbols
